arStrings.szText: “It sounds as though you and Zoltun had an argument before he left."
"An argument." Ha! That is beyond an understatement.

When we discovered the demon, we believed it was a trifle – easily dealt with. But Malphas was tenacious. Every attempt to remove it ended in failure. After much time and many debates, we reached our breaking point.
Zoltun gave up on the Loom, and I did not. It is as simple as that.
